attributes.action: outlaw Polish road signs,  plus multilingual NHS documents and court literature
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the rate payer is funding road signs and multi-lingual documents for foreigners. 
the British public shouldn't have to pay to make life easier for people who can't speak english. These people won't bother to learn it, if our taxes are used to make Britain into a would-be replica of every other EU state.
